binding:binding.name: Bluetooth Binding
binding:binding.description: This binding supports the Bluetooth protocol.

parameter.name: kalmanfiltertype
parameter.label: Kalman filter (RSSI)
parameter.description: Kalman filter to removes noise and spikes from RSSI.

parameter.name: environmentalfactor
parameter.label: Environmental factor (Distance)
parameter.description: Constant depends on the environmental factor.

parameter.name: onlinetimeout
parameter.label: Online timeout
parameter.description: Bluetooth devices not showing any activity are considered to be offline after exceeding this timeout (seconds).

parameter.name: synchronizemac
parameter.label: Synchronize MAC address (Mobile Phones)
parameter.description: Use the device name to synchronize the MAC address.
